headline: Thinking About Buying a Rental Property in 2025? Consider Doing This Instead.
summary: Many people dream of owning a portfolio of rental properties that can produce enough passive income to cover their living expenses.  My strategy is to invest in real estate investment trusts (REITs) and other real estate investments that don't require me to manage rental properties.  Here are a couple of top REITs to consider investing in before you go down the path of purchasing your first rental property in 2025.
